verses.roman:
'vaiṣṇava' dekhiyā prabhura ardha-bāhya ha-ila
svarūpa-gosāñire kichu kahite lāgila

synonyms: vaiṣṇava dekhiyā—seeing the devotees; prabhura—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; ardha-bāhya—half-external consciousness; ha-ila—there was; svarūpa-gosāñire—unto Svarūpa Gosāñi; kichu—something; kahite lāgila—began to speak.
translation: When Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu saw all the Vaiṣṇavas, He returned to partial external consciousness and spoke to Svarūpa Dāmodara.
